title: Dried Fish Worth N60m Seized From Insurgents By Army
content: The 7 Division of the Nigerian Army has destroyed over 2,000 cartons of dried fish estimated at 60 million Naira seized from suspected Boko Haram terrorists in Borno State. Spokesperson of the Division, Colonel Tukur Ceremony, today showed reporters the recovered items in Maiduguri, the capital of the State. He said that the suspected insurgents, who had resorted to robbery and cattle rustling, were believed to also be engaged in commerce to fund their activities.
